creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: tall vase with wide shoulder that tapers to narrow foot; alternating horizontal stripes of black slip and yellow ask glaze decorate sides of body; glaze is drippy and runny; small blue glass impressed squares on shoulder; narrow mouth at top is shaped like a cylinder
markings: printed sticker on bottom: MH204; two impressed makers mark on bottom: 92
medium: Stoneware with yellow ash glaze; black slip, blue glaze
title: Ten-gallon vase
